text: eyaṭa ovun “ō ṣuayib! api, apagē mutun mittan næmadū devivarunva athæra damana menda, api apagē vastūngen apē kæmættaṭa anuva kaṭayutu kirīma athæra damana menda, (oba apaṭa niyōga karana lesada) obagē salātayada obava poḷam̆ba vannē? niyata vaśayenma oba itāmat karuṇāven yutu ṛju keneki!” yayi (samaccalayen men) pævasūha
